title: Net charge on sphere after induced charge

content.question: Two initially uncharged metal spheres are mounted on insulating stands and placed in contact with each other, as shown above. A student brings a positively charged insulating rod near sphere I. Sphere II is then removed, and finally the rod is moved away. What is the net charge on sphere I?

choices.label: Either a positive or a negative charge, depending on the sizes of the spheres
Either a positive or a negative charge, depending on the amount of charge on the rod

topic.text: 10.2: Conservation of Electric Charge and the Process of Charging
